name: e-Species
short_description: This is a pure Python CGI-based implementation of a taxonomically intelligent species search engine. It searches biological databases for a taxonomic name. The search is done "on the fly" using web services (SOAP/XML) or URL API's.
summary: A taxonomically intelligent biodiversity search engine
